text: Upaix is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D22, D51, D151, D151L, D212, D251, D622, D722, D1085 and N0 roads pass through the commune. == Location == The commune borders the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Upaix
